indications: Blepharitis, edema, ascites, jaundice, chlorosis, nebula, hepatosplenomegaly, verruca
Snake or insect bites, pyogenic and ulcerous ulcerations, dermatosis

notes: This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
This herb has been shown to kill cancer cells.
It is said that this herb stops the pain of Stomach ulcer and treats tinea and scabies.
The juice removes swelling when applied topically.
For flat warts, apply the juice of this herb topically for five to fifteen minutes three times a day
